        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1                     <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">

                    Negative review from a personal point of view for one reviewer

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2354427" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352490" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Joyandsparklesx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Joyandsparklesx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352490ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352490" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243904">Joyandsparklesx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont smell any pickles. For me is very earthy and woodsy. Almost like a woodshop. I obviously dont use it by itself. I layer with it to make sweeter fragances more bearable. This is def not a blind buy as it has many polarized opinions. Some love it and some hate it but to me its a very unique scent i have never smelt before</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2352490"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2352490#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345667" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LuciaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341816"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LuciaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Beloved-Woman-15184.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15184.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beloved Woman"title="Beloved Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341816">LuciaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 15:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After dabbing a sample, I was sure that it was a serene, comforting scent. But oh no. After showering I applied it to my wrists and waited expectantly for a divine, meditative perfume, and boy was I wrong. This stinker is like a sharp aftershave you smell on the subway too early in the morning that makes your head reel. I can't deal with it. Ugh. Sample, meet garbage pail, without a single regret. Sorry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2345667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2345667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Yes I appreciated how ethically made this perfume is created but it is just disappointing, overpriced, and hard to pick up unless hugged. Too much wood and leather makes it off-putting, makes me want to puke. و نمیشه روی بازخورد مثبتش از طرف همه هم حساب کرد<br />
در کل یه مقدار اورریتد حساب میشه<br />

Sorry mom!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2329761"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2329761#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327830" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327830" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="desertdweller"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2069581"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2069581.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="desertdweller" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfum-d-Empire/Eau-Suave-5625.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5625.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Suave"title="Eau Suave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327830ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327830" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2069581">desertdweller</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 20:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok, so this is sandalwood for wussies. The opening is a powdery skin scent type of sandalwood very reminiscent of milky Musk from parle moi de parfum. The most fascinating thing about this is that just when you decide to yawn because it is so boring it becomes violet. For me that is it. There is sandalwood. Then the sandalwood departs and there is violet. I get nothing more, nothing less. I can't even understand the identity of this perfume, let alone the hype. This is coming from someone who loves sandalwood and violet but this composition is just underwhelming to me. It's like chic corporate girl who thinks this is daring but is really just playing it safe. If you are looking for incensey hippie middle eastern type of sandalwood, move along. This is pretty girl sandalwood, hence it's popularity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2327830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2327830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327126" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327126" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mint_on_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725171"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1725171.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mint_on_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Phlur/Mango-Mood-87259.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87259.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mango Mood"title="Mango Mood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327126ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327126" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725171">mint_on_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 07:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>genuinely smells like nori/sushi seaweed, which is insane, because its not fishy at all, it genuinely smells like seaweed but not the sea? i don't know.. i understand the pickle comments as well but I never expected myself to. the drydown is much less offensive and I completely see how after, on the right skin, this could be pulled off and potentially smell really good, unique, and sophisticated, but I cant completely imagine It because I have yet to meet someone with a wallet thick enough and enough swagger to do so.<br />
<br />
drydown is much more of a pure simple sandalwood, which is really nice, it just smells confusing with the seaweed lurking about.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2327126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2327126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326792" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PaleSeptember"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137927"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PaleSeptember" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137927">PaleSeptember</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 21:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of those scents I can only handle in small doses because to my nose, it projects like crazy. Yet my husband can’t smell it on me at all. I get mostly cedar. Not a sweet pine smell, but a very primal, ancient wood smell. Imagine laying down on a warm pile of orange pine needles. It’s bitter and sharp, but draws you in somehow in a comforting way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2326792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2326792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325923" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pinkapoppy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193167"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="pinkapoppy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); I don’t know whether it’s the type of cardamon in this, or maybe the papyrus but the opening is kinda aromatic in a VERY spicy way. I don’t get the pickle note but I see where people are coming from with it. Nice but I would never buy a bottle, I think this could do with more violet or more cozy sweetness in general  but I do really like the base of this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I smelled this fragrance when I was in LA 5 years ago, and always thought it was great. I bought Santal Sky by Kierin NYC a few years back and always thought it smelled like Santal 33, but because it was a one time smell from a long time ago, I forgot. Now I can truly say, they are very close to each other. If you dont want to pay Le Labo price, get Santal Sky.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2322939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2322939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />

<br />
but yes, my main take away would be try to test in on skin more than keeping the impression from the paper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2321995"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2321995#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321266" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sting Key"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2263115"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2263115.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sting Key" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-890.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.890.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo"title="Polo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2263115">Sting Key</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 18:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just sampled this for the first time and it is unironically one of the best scents I've ever smelled. It took my breath away, I had no idea what to compare sandalwood to. I come to Fragrantica to share my bliss with other people who surely love this fragrance and... oh... pickles. Now I hate it. Thanks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2321266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2321266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Alone or to give a sandalwood edge when layered with other cool weather fragrances.  It’s comforting for fall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2319066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2319066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318818" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Dry cloying wood with a slight pickle vibe.<br />
Try it for yourself, not a blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2318818"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2318818#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Are you sure? On me this scent is a beast.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2315114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2315114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311889" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mindeulle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283179"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mindeulle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283179">Mindeulle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 02:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The best perfume I ever tried so far! I don't like the opening smell toooooo strong!!!!!<br />
strong enough to make people hate you. but when it dry down it smells amazing and lasts very long up to 5-7days on clothes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2311889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2311889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311648" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311648" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BloomingSomewhere"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765636"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1765636.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BloomingSomewhere" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311648ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311648" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765636">BloomingSomewhere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 17:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A girl walked into my office and the whole room was quickly filled with INTENSE vetiver and it lingered long after she stepped outside. I thought for sure she had soaked herself in vetiver oil and I asked her what she was wearing, it was santal 33. it was strong but also very natural and earth goddessy.<br />
<br />
A few months later I was on the train in Tokyo and this unbearably cool girl smelled faintly like sandalwood and it was so spicy and sexy. I'm pretty sure it was santal 33. <br />
<br />
I have a little tester of it and I hate the plastic leather smell that I get for the first 15 minutes, but once it dries down it becomes the most enthralling and comforting creamy, spicy sandalwood. Unfortunately I'm obsessed. It does have an incredible similairity to Un Pistache by Obvios, and Function Fragrance by the Nue Co.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2311648"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2311648#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309918" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309918" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NostalgicHaze"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2281374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2281374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NostalgicHaze" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309918ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309918" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2281374">NostalgicHaze</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 07:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I want to start by saying that this will be my first review, and this fragrance inspired me to write it.<br />
<br />
I’m not well-versed in notes or how they behave, but I’m someone who has vibed with fragrances for about twenty years. What Santal 33 has given me is something that no other fragrance has ever made me feel. Before buying it, I had several bottles of Energetically New York and El Ganso Bravo Monsieur, and I believe those two have nothing in common with Le Labo's best seller. They may share similar notes, but the fragrances behave very differently—they’re just completely different scents.<br />
<br />
I can describe my experience with the following words:<br />
<br />
Every time I wear it, I feel like I’m on a starry night in the desert, untamed, after having traveled for days already. A pause by the warmth of a campfire, laughing with friends, knowing that with the first light, the adventure continues. Whenever I focus on the fragrance, it inspires a sense of calm and confidence, as if everything will be alright.<br />
<br />
Any scent that makes me feel this way is a solid 10 in my book. I hope to discover more perfumes like this—so complex and inspiring… Until that happens, it will likely remain my favorite fragrance.<br />
<br />
Regarding the juice itself, the only objective thing I can distinguish is how creamy it feels when I smell it, with woods I can’t quite identify but find mysterious and intriguing, alongside a hint of leather—like that of an old jacket, in the best way possible.<br />
<br />
Around the tenth hour, as the fragrance fades, I feel a warmth on my skin that I assume is the cardamom and perhaps a vanilla note I can’t quite pinpoint. From there, the fragrance bids farewell, leaving a floral and sweet remnant—perhaps the violet? It reminds me of the scent of a woman lingering on a pillow the next morning. Until I discovered Santal 33, I never imagined a perfume could be an art form… Frank Voelkl is the real master.<br />
<br />
And the experience of purchasing this fragrance is truly unique. Getting to know the person who will blend it for you and witnessing the process, only to wait a week for the bottle to be ready for use, makes it even more special.<br />
<br />
Hope it helps.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2309918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2309918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309348" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309348" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tinkerbelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2147661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2147661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tinkerbelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nateeva/Dominican-Republic-45297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dominican Republic"title="Dominican Republic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309348ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309348" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304329" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Justinvsjkidd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Justinvsjkidd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304329ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304329" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713750">Justinvsjkidd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>50ml - 95% full for sale, no box. Will ship anywhere in US<br />
<br />
DM me for inquiries.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2304329"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2304329#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303445" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303445" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Faedriel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581363"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1581363.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Faedriel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303445ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303445" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581363">Faedriel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 07:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume. For years I tried not to, refused to buy into the hype. Then a weird string of events lead me to saying “WELP I guess it’s time to try Santal 33 then!”<br />
<br />
First of all, I strategically purchased dossier’s dupe first. I loved it. It has no leather, and it lacks the depth of the real thing - BUT if you love the scent and love spraying it on your clothes or even when you need an aromatic pick me up, it’s a safe thing to have on hand so you’re not spraying your expensive Le Labo everywhere. Dossier’s dupe &amp; Santal 33 are not twins, they’re more like very close cousins.<br />
<br />
Once that was out of the way I ordered two sample sizes from Le Labo and they arrived the next day and oh. My god. I’m in love. <br />
<br />
Let’s talk about everyone’s fav complaint - there are no pickles here. I consistently only smell a very fresh and lovely cucumber note that I can consistently pick out on its own. It’s so uplifting and sparkling, it’s beautiful.<br />
Normally I hate leather in perfumes, it’s the only note that’ll give me a headache but it’s subtle and blends well and adds to the scent, so I’m very impressed with how they’ve executed that.  <br />
<br />
I saw someone describe this perfume as “dusty” and 1) I don’t get that on me but that may be because 2) the Dossier dupe is MUCH dustier, almost acrid at times. So coming off of that, Santal 33 is downright creamy - at least on my skin.<br />
<br />
Now. I LOVE sandalwood but I’m picky about it. I would never turn to this if I wanted a sandalwood centric fragrance, there’s so much else going on and such an atmosphere being built that the sandalwood sits as a nice steady base but not the star of the fragrance if that makes sense.<br />
<br />
Given the number of negative reviews I constantly see at the top for this frag I’m going to assume now the cool thing to do is to hate on it and point out how it’s not *that* good.<br />
 <br />
To some people it actually is *that* good. Don’t be put off by the negative reviews - this is something you need to smell for yourself, on yourself, let develop and smell the changes throughout the day. Ordering samples is a great option, so is looking to see if any (I think it’s) Nordstrom stores near you have a Le Labo counter so you can smell in person, spritz it on and see how it wears on you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2303445"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2303445#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302501" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302501" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rosebush340"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321387"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321387.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rosebush340" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Matcha-26-69731.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69731.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Matcha 26"title="The Matcha 26"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302501ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302501" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321387">rosebush340</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 10:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's bold to claim this mess is sandalwood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2302501"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2302501#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301408" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hustletuberose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082307"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2082307.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hustletuberose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Phlur/Missing-Person-72665.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72665.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Missing Person"title="Missing Person"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301408ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301408" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082307">hustletuberose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 11:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the worst fragrances I've ever smelled. Obviously that is not the case for everyone since it is so popular. This is a very male-leaning fragrance (imo) and smells like sweat/B.O. to my nose. It smells literally just like sandalwood and leather. That's it. This fragrance has caused me to be scared of sandalwood fragrances, haha. Fragrance PTSD.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2301408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2301408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300223" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300223" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AKhaing"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2267012"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2267012.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AKhaing" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Santa-Maria-Novella/L-Iris-74288.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74288.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Iris"title="L'Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300223ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300223" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2267012">AKhaing</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 11:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I mean, this perfume changed the game. It makes the niche market what it is today and there’s a reason for it. <br />
<br />
Pure class in a bottle. I grew up with memory of my mom smelling absolutely amazing and royal with sandalwood (she would just get a paste out of pure heartwood of sandalwood and wear it on her skin/arm and forearm like a fragrance and sunscreen, it’s her thing). This is the first perfume that makes me think of her and that memory as soon as I smell it. It’s mature, classy, beautiful and confident. So iconic and it’s for a reason.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2300223"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2300223#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2297161" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="QueOndaGuera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1827142.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="QueOndaGuera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Sweetly-Known-64644.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64644.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweetly Known"title="Sweetly Known"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2297161ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2297161" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827142">QueOndaGuera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 13:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>These reviews crack me up!! Yes it is completely pickle ish and you know what, I love it! I love pickled sandalwood 😂 I absolutely would not buy a full bottle due to pricing alone but I am happy with my sample tester because two sprays lasts for hours. I can see the longevity being awful if you do not enjoy the smell so buyer beware. It reminds me slightly of Dedcool’s “Blonde” which I also love and I also see people comment that it smells like pickles as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2297161"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2297161#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295240" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="richcat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930288"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="richcat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295240ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295240" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930288">richcat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 20:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I saw so much hype about Santal 33, so my jaw nearly dropped when I smelled this for the first time. I could not believe people wanted to smell like this; smelled like artificial woody rot to me :/<br />
<br />
all the power to the Santal 33 fans, but I'm glad I can save my coin!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2295240"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2295240#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294716" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294716" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zongo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1559457.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zongo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294716ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294716" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559457">Zongo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 10:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Holy mother of madness, what twisted alchemy have these Le Labo lunatics cooked up? Santal 33, they call it. A scent that promises the rugged American West but delivers a swift kick to the olfactory balls with all the subtlety of a drunken buffalo in a china shop.<br />
<br />
Let's get one thing straight, you perfume-huffing degenerates: this isn't your typical eau de whatever. No, this is a full-blown sensory assault, priced like it's distilled from the dreams of Gatsby himself.<br />
<br />
The moment this concoction hits your nostrils, you're whisked away on a psychedelic rodeo ride. Sandalwood and leather slap you across the face, while cardamom and iris pirouette in the background like deranged ballerinas. It's a scent that screams "I have more money than sense" louder than a Wall Street trader on cocaine.<br />
<br />
But here's where it gets weird, folks. Just when you think you've got a handle on this olfactory Frankenstein, it shape-shifts faster than a chameleon on acid. One moment, you're in a high-end hotel lobby, rubbing elbows with the silicon-enhanced elite. The next, you're face-first in a jar of artisanal pickles at some hipster deli in Brooklyn.<br />
<br />
Is it good? Is it bad? Who the fuck knows anymore? It's like asking if a Rorschach test would make good wallpaper. It's not about liking it, it's about surviving it.<br />
<br />
The longevity? Eternal. This stuff clings to you like a needy ex-lover, refusing to let go long after you've moved on to greener, less pickle-scented pastures. The sillage? Moderate, they say. Ha! It's about as moderate as a Vegas casino's air conditioning.<br />
<br />
And the price? Sweet Jesus on a pogo stick, it's steeper than the learning curve at a quantum physics convention for goldfish. You could buy a decent used car for what these maniacs are charging. Or a lifetime supply of actual pickles, if that's your thing.<br />
<br />
In the end, Santal 33 is less of a fragrance and more of an experience – a wild, confusing, potentially bankrupt-inducing experience. It's not for the faint of heart or the tight of wallet. But if you've got more money than sense and a burning desire to smell like a luxury hotel's attempt at making artisanal pickles, then by all means, dive in headfirst.<br />
<br />
Just remember, when the dust settles and the sandalwood fades, you're still you – just poorer and slightly more confused about your life choices. Welcome to the wild world of niche perfumery, you brave, beautiful bastards.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2294716"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2294716#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294702" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Dries down and smells like a cheap bottle of aftershave for men</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2294702"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2294702#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; For this I no longer buy Le Labo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2290778"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2290778#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290537" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dee97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dee97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); Reminds me of coconuts even though it’s not listed. Very strong, 2 sprays max should be enough.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2290537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2290537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285907" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285907" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Odilia769"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1542985"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Odilia769" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Orchestre-Parfum/Piano-Santal-57336.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57336.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Piano Santal "title="Piano Santal "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285907ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285907" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1542985">Odilia769</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 10:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought my bottle,I thought I made the wrong decision because I hated it. Now a year later, I don't know what's going on but I can't live without it..it's so fresh and so beautiful. I'm in love. Santal 33 is in my top 10 favoriete fragrance. The magic of this fragrance is in the Air. I have so many compliments when I wear santal 33. Sometime I layered with another 13. So so good!! :-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2285907"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2285907#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285307" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ha1100-"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997552"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ha1100-" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285307ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285307" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997552">Ha1100-</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 20:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just really don’t understand how it’s possible for people to hate this scent, it’s a very green clean scent it does have a strong opening but not in a bad way at all just a very sharp citrus and earthy smell initially. The dry down of this is also just gorgeous I think it’s the ultimate clean everyday scent, makes it feel like you just took a bougie shower after a long day at the beach</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2285307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2285307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285185" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hunybunbun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2254013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2254013.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hunybunbun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-Man-920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection Man"title="Reflection Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2254013">hunybunbun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 17:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First 30 secs was a blast of cool super dry spice dill, then slowly turned into a high end cowboy boot store.  Very leather musky sweetness reveal.  Turns dusty, reminds me of Santa Fe for that reason.   I could see why people like it.  It's not something I would wear every day.   That being said, if you travel and take road trips, I could see this scent coming to the rescue.  Smells very human.  <br />
<br />
*also, I used to roll my own cigarettes and this has a bit of a Bali Shag vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2285185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2285185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284891" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249137">Farangismua</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 14:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Every bougee hotel or boutique smells like this. Want to smell rich? get this.
