padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271703" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="memery1010"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2217355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2217355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="memery1010" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271703ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271703" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2217355">memery1010</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a beautiful log cabin or expensive cedar furniture, in the best way. Very refreshing and addicting. I sprayed once on a blanket to test it last night, and I can still smell it from across the room the next morning. Powerful stuff! Yet not *over*powering, as long as you don't use too much.<br />
<br />
(Edit): To soften this scent and give it a more well-rounded profile, I tried adding a couple drops of frankincense with some oil to my wrists. It blends well and gives it a gentle warmth and sweetness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2271703"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2271703#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271201" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271201" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="htattybear"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2225186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2225186.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="htattybear" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271201ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271201" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2225186">htattybear</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 07:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not really sure where people are getting dill from but I don’t get any dill on my skin (I did try this on my boyfriend and I can get a bit more funkiness pickle which is so interesting to me while on me it was near linear).<br />
<br />
This is a pleasant woody scent and I can see why it’s exciting to some people but to me it smells so basic! I grew up in Burma where everyone and their mother’s slathers on Thanaka wood paste and it’s very nostalgic. Instead of the bright slightly citrus and white floral notes that make up the Thanaka wood, this perfume feels more sultry and moodier. <br />
<br />
Sadly this might be the reason I’m not super excited about this perfume as others as I feel like I’m accustomed to this type of scent story. I’ll come back to this perfume after exploring more sandalwoods and other woody scents in general.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2271201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2271201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1844475">lucidence</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now tell me why someone thought it would be a fun idea to put a dill scent in a perfume 🤨</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2271118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2271118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270516" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="urrke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149637"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2149637.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="urrke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270516ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270516" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149637">urrke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 15:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I eat pickles everyday and I don't get the comparison. It smells something like furniture store, old books or woodwork workshop. Definitely unique, I like it but I don't see myself wearing it since I'm not 30+. Lasts 8+ hours and projects really good, I get whiffs of it even after 5 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2270516"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2270516#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267932" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jordanroselittle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927591"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jordanroselittle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267932ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267932" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927591">jordanroselittle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 05:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first love 💖 It's an intense smell and one that creates strong responses from the people you encounter. Strong sillage and long lasting, so not one to wear on public transport or in crowded enclosed spaces. I love it for date nights. The scent notes combine in a way that is reminiscent of incense. The sandalwood and leather are the most noticeable notes, though they do mellow on dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2267932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2267932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267728" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267728" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LadyEmilyJones"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801609"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1801609.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LadyEmilyJones" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267728ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267728" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801609">LadyEmilyJones</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 23:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gun to my head, if you told me I'd have to wear this perfume once or scrub Satan's sweaty balls with my bare hands, I'd say pass the damn soap. Somehow pickles and other salty vegetable brine became one of the most popular scents of the moment. The woody sophistication it markets itself as having, is completely undetectable, overpowered by a repulsive scent of mouldy herbs and produce. If the green notes were more subtle and less of an assault to the senses, more balanced with cedar and florals, perhaps the smell wouldn't send me into a homicidal rage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2267728"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2267728#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2267653" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stevenflorescent10"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1984716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stevenflorescent10" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2267653ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2267653" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984716">stevenflorescent10</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 21:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Woody. Very woody. It smells better at dry down when the Leather and Florals becomes more alive and gives the overly simple “woody” scent, at first, some depth. Unique, well blended, and kinda addicting. You need to give it time to grow on you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2267653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2267653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2267263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
But if Santal 33 smells like pickles? Shiit, y’all bout to catch me smelling like the whole jar!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2267263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2267263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266526" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266526" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShaimaWay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShaimaWay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Oud-Satin-Mood-30352.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30352.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Satin Mood"title="Oud Satin Mood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266526ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266526" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656746">ShaimaWay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 21:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is definitely an acquired taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2266526"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2266526#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265466" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Melody Valentine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Melody Valentine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Love-Don-t-Be-Shy-4322.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4322.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Don't Be Shy"title="Love Don't Be Shy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265466ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265466" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747732">Melody Valentine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 00:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is totally not the type of perfume I'd ever usually like and I can see why it's so polarising but I kinda like it. I don't live somewhere where everyone wears this, like a lot of other people are saying, so I don't feel like I'd be wearing the same as everyone else.<br />
<br />
It smells much nicer in the air than if you just sniff it up close. It's definitely unisex but I'd say it leans just a little bit more to the masculine side, especially at first. The dry down and scent trail is really quite lovely though. It lasts for ages aswell and I keep getting whiffs of it whenever I move my arms about or walking over to my mam's last night I could smell something nice even through my pretty blocked up nose and realised it was this that I'd only sprayed a little bit of on my hand.<br />
<br />
The scent itself, to me, starts off quite sharp and herbal, and as I say masculine but then turns softer with subtle iris and violet. Finally settling into creamy, fuzzy, sandalwood but there's something else that I can't place. It's almost coconutty, something creamy and comforting. It might just be the sandalwood It reminds me of some other perfume, or the woody base of it anyway. I don't get dill pickles but I can see why people say that, to me it's more like fresh herbs and that's only up close. <br />
<br />
*I typed this out and forgot to post ages ago and just now I accidentally sprayed my sample of it on and didn't realise what it was at first when I thought I smelled coconut. Then I read the label and it made sense. I got coconut when I first tried it too. The dry down is nice, it's Parma Violets and sandalwood to me. Reminds me of the sandalwood of Samsara and Allure. Now I'm not as sure whether I find it masculine or not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2265466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2265466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265422" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265422" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luxlucisf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462743"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="luxlucisf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Capitale-Eau-de-Parfum-58391.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58391.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Capitale Eau de Parfum"title="Eau Capitale Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265422ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265422" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462743">luxlucisf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 22:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Neoliberalism in a bottle. Bland, depthless, generic, overrated. And of course, overpriced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2265422"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2265422#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264435" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264435" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hilton_drw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792876"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hilton_drw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermès"title="Terre d'Hermès"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264435ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264435" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792876">hilton_drw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 01:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just get Absolute Santal by Elite Gentleman Avon. <br />
Same perfumer and costs 20 times less.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2264435"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2264435#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
2.5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2263868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2263868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262568" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="autumnjoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1558761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1558761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="autumnjoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262568ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262568" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1558761">autumnjoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 09:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first introduction to “niche” perfumery back in 2019 and because of that, it will always be special to me. Smelling it instantly transports me back to that time: 24 years old, pre-Covid LA in the fall time, going out dancing on the weekends at clubs and concerts, being in love with my boyfriend, getting intoxicated at parties… when I spray it now I actually feel slightly intoxicated. It’s funny because it’s not a party scent at all, I just loved it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2262568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2262568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2262055"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2262055#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260161" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Oubliette Binoche"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171381"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2171381.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Oubliette Binoche" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Five-O-Clock-Au-Gingembre-2764.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2764.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"title="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260161ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260161" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171381">Oubliette Binoche</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 00:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried this on at Nordstrom the other day by spraying myself and a paper test strip. I had heard about the dill pickle note but thought perhaps people might be exaggerating and, well, yeah, it really does smell like dill pickle juice. The interplay between the sour dill pickle note and the warm, sweet, sandalwood note is not pleasant. The whole composition is discordant and it is very linear— pickles all the way down. To add insult to injury this scent triggered a huge allergy/phlegm response for my spouse in the car ride home. I just could not wash this off fast enough. I seek out weird fragrances and appreciate many of them but this one was extremely not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2260161"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2260161#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259510" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like it, a lot, but at the same time I could also see myself getting sick of it quite quickly, if that makes sense.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2259510"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2259510#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158223">Prunel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 08:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's pretty decent. But I don't get why it's got so much hype. To me it smells like clean sandalwood with a bit of pickles. It smells good but that's about it, for that price I expect more. Performance is very good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2259453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2259453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259269" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="semyonsemyoff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2087624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="semyonsemyoff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Bottled-383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Bottled"title="Boss Bottled"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624">semyonsemyoff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 04:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can't believe it. It's plain dilled pickles... And not like cornichons with garlic, just the worst dilled pickles you can have, a lot of dill, a lot... <br />
<br />
It must be some sick joke. I really wouldn't call it a perfume, it's a "smell"... Really sorry people, don't mean to offend, but this things is down there with the worst. I guess that's what papyrus smells like - dill<br />
<br />
No sandalwood, no leather, no cedar, no iris. <br />
<br />
I guess if you've never even tried or heard of dilled pickles then you may like it, but this thing doesn't bring any positive associations if you do know them pickles</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2259269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2259269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258668" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crbrlnrcsst"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1916332"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1916332.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="crbrlnrcsst" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coreterno/Oceanoir-91359.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91359.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oceanoir"title="Oceanoir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258668ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258668" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1916332">crbrlnrcsst</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pickles :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2258668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2258668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257455" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ItDoesntMakeScents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085743"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ItDoesntMakeScents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085743">ItDoesntMakeScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It’s “cool” to hate on this fragrance. Elitist will say it’s terrible but I suggest you buy a small sample or decant and try it for yourself. It’s so popular for a reason. Really pleasant scent. <br />
<br />
I sprayed the Cremo dupe and Santal 33 side by side and there is a large difference.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2257455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2257455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256579" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256579" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="1annie.beth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862342"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1862342.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="1annie.beth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Rosie-Jane/Rosie-52177.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52177.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rosie"title="Rosie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256579ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256579" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862342">1annie.beth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was gifted a sample of Santal 33, and must admit I can understand the hype around this scent. It's got a little bit of the dill thing going on, but the other santal craze 'dupes' on the market are way worse. It's smooth, demure and luxurious, and the leather note really makes it for me. I picture a Western wear shop full of leather boots with polished wood walls and ceilings. I wouldn't wear it because it's not my style, but I would love to smell this on my man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2256579"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2256579#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252147" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252147" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Juleigh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2017834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2017834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Juleigh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Alhambra/Kismet-Angel-79015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kismet Angel"title="Kismet Angel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252147ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252147" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); For the price point, it doesn't last or project. Way overpriced for the performance. I've found dupes that are WAY better and around $30.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2252147"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2252147#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; However the top notes that I can detect are dry, sour, and borderline foul. I could never justify the price of this, nor would I want to. Diptyque Tam Dao remains top of my list for a GREAT sandalwood fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2251125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2251125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250743" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It consists of: Cedarwood - Cardamom - Iris - Violet - Australian Sandalwood - Leather - Musk</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2250743"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2250743#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247469" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2247469" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Art"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/20656"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.20656.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Art" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal 33"title="Santal 33"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2247469ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2247469" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/20656">Art</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 01:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I spending a day thinking about what is Santal 33  reminded me of, and I realized that it just like combination of Encre noire by Lalique mixed with Encens Suave by Matiere premiere. This open with ISO E Super with green and acidic touch, it 70% of this scent is ISO E Super that smells like cedar wood or pencil shaving and that’s reason why many people complain about Furniture store or pencil shaving smells. and then it’s dry down get closer and closer to Encens Suave with raw wood (from wood incense) that rounded by soft sweet creamy vanilla. I think it’s is OK to me, but it reminded me of a few fragrance that I already have in my wardrobe, it’s ISO E Super but less projection than Encre Noire and raw wood smooth and semi-sweet creamy vanilla just like Encens Suave but less projection and longevity, so I won’t buying it again.<br />
<br />
Updated: <br />
Yes it’s combined of Encre Noire and Encens Sauve, even I try to layers both of them in another hand and compare , it’s 70% Encre Noire and 30% of Encens Suave compare it side by side. So so close.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2247469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2247469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244979" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="the_badger"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/868045"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.868045.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="the_badger" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/868045">the_badger</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I remember when Santal 33 used to be an obscure, niche fragrance. As was Le Labo, a little known brand. Suddenly it skyrocketed in popularity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2244979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2244979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242598" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242598" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eau de Cornichon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eau de Cornichon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242598ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242598" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753083">Eau de Cornichon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 06:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It might be overused in some places but there really aren't that many people who wear it where I live, and the more I wear it the more I like it. Especially the drydown. <br />
<br />
Granted, it's expensive, probably less interesting than similarly priced options, but I think that its wearability is what really sets it apart. <br />
It's clean, round and androgynous, it doesn't impose or require you to dress or carry yourself in any particular manner. It's neither formal nor casual, it hardly even smells like a perfume, but it's really nice and easygoing. Great performance as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2242598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2242598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242255" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oioldian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2210154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="oioldian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242255ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242255" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2210154">oioldian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>it is very strong, sharp, and smells like a hotel in cancun called the moon palace. alternatively, a spa or a woman with confidence. although the sandalwood note in it alone is not particularly unique, the smell is pleasantly jarring in a sea of florals, fruit, and vanilla. though i do feel like this note is shared among many perfumes and is recognizable once identified (jungle santal, neon / dream moon) i think it smells very nice. it is hard to attribute particular traits to santal 33- i think the magic of this perfume is the person who wears it.<br />
<br />
e: now having moved, i smell this scent or some reminder of this scent everywhere, sandalwood is quite distinct and repetitive. in the wild, santal 33 seems to be the sharpest out of all, a migrainic quality that shoots down to the brainstem. yet, the the smell of perfumery sandalwood always unique, alluring, and addictive- would use sparingly.<br />
<br />
e2: starting to smell a woody base really strongly now after repeated use.. not sure what that's about. but i do love the smell from a distance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2242255"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2242255#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241377" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Darkroast12"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2109677"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Darkroast12" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2109677">Darkroast12</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 00:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you're chronically online and only follow influencers for culture, you might think this is overrated but tbh it's not. Those who know of Le Labo know this, but honestly the majority people don't recognize it. I actually find Another 13 in public more often than this. <br />
<br />
It smells like stepping into a boots specialty store, one where the boots starts at $250, so mores like freshly cut pale leather. Not bacon or tobacco leather smells, such as Stetson. The 'pickle', people talk about is how it has a brine quality to it and how vinegar tickles your nose. Btw, real sandalwood smells creamy and woodsy, not peppery. Surprisingly, for me (or maybe my batch at least) isn't woody forward, but leathery. <br />
<br />
For me, this is masculine, but not in the boyfriend's car kind of way, but more so in a night time date kind of way. It's pricy; I found it at Costco online for almost half the price. I feel like bc of the price it's not going to become a staple, so you're safe. You won't be a poser or hipster, remember it will smell different on you. I highly recommend a sample set from Le Labo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2241377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2241377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237510" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="specialfairygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="specialfairygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-for-Her-38497.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38497.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus for Her"title="Aventus for Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237510ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237510" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112296">specialfairygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 06:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh so THIS is the raved Le Labo fragrance. If you go their stores this is what they smell like. Very noticeable and unique, I think it's better as a shower gel perhaps than a perfume. I get the pickle reference but I think it's a bit harsh. This is an interesting creation, not really my cup of tea but we have to give credit sometimes. Id say if Baccarat Rouge 540 is the scent of the 2010s, Santal 33 is right there with it. You have to live under a rock not to know it, and recognise it. Minimal and almost (just almost) harsh in its on way, linear scent as Im finding out on many of the Le Labo offerings (meaning not a shape shifter). If you'd like to smell like a nice pickle you might like it LOL</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2237510"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2237510#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
