align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2236874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2236874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2234174" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="camphor_lover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="camphor_lover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2234174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2234174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712486">camphor_lover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 17:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Of course Santal 33 is flanked by haters, that's the price you pay when Taylor Swift is a wearer among millions. The contrarian impulse is in me too. Yeah it smells like hamster cage fluff, but isn't that what cedarwood smells like? The answer is no, not necessarily.  But I love the smell of hamster cage fluff. I'm happy when Taylor Swift comes on at the CVS. I love you Santal 33.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2234174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2234174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232748" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232748" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="igorvida87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921707"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1921707.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="igorvida87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Moschino/Toy-Boy-55858.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55858.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Toy Boy"title="Toy Boy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232748ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232748" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921707">igorvida87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 09:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was taken aback with the harshness of the alcoholic opening. That aside, it is a linear fragrance very reminiscent of Number 04 Bois de Balincourt, but with a leathery drydown. I personally like Santal 33 but the price point is ludicrous considering that Bois de Balincourt (the oil version) is more affordable and presents sandalwood in a creamier and more sophisticated interpretation on how a modern woody fragrance should smell. I have layered both fragrances and the leather in Santal 33 really adds up to Bois de Balincourt. I have to say it is perfectly unisex and a really interesting option for not being a citrus-musky unisex scent. That is a feat! <br />
<br />
If you’re really into the hype of wearing this but are skeptical of “committing” a blind purchase, get Number 04 Bois de Balincourt oil version in 3ml. You’re welcome!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2232748"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2232748#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231945" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Goldena35"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1807650"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1807650.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Goldena35" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/L-Eau-Papier-78658.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78658.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau Papier"title="L'Eau Papier"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1807650">Goldena35</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 12:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am surprised by the cult following this scent has mustered. I was very underwhelmed with the opening…but its mid drydown was compelling. This reads heavily violet on my skin. With the sweet green violet at an interesting contrast with a dry and crackling woody, papery, leathery base. The cardamom is dark and fairly bitter and very in your face at times, but then retreats. It may be the most firmly unisex perfume I have ever smelled (I still tend to view a perfume as leaning towards one or the other a bit, but this truly sits right on that middle line for me.) I don’t love it , would never purchase it, but wanted to smell it simply because it jumped out of our perfume obsessed corner into mainstream culture. I’m glad I did. Maybe a few more wears will open some more doors.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2231945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2231945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; - Planking<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2230147" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Launcue"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204907"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Launcue" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2230147ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2230147" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204907">Launcue</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My skin is one of those that absorbs scent. Most colognes last on me no more than 2 hours. This is one of the exceptions! Every single time I wear it, which is not often given its price, I am stopped and asked what I'm wearing or told that I smell very good. This sent lasts all day with very few sprays. I love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2230147"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2230147#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229957" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heliotrope72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heliotrope72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Love-Tuberose-50889.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50889.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Tuberose"title="Love Tuberose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229957ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229957" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661">Heliotrope72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 08:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>MBTI: ENTP, ISFP<br />
<br />
Smell of inner city noveau rich and hipsters.<br />
In 25-35°C and high humidity, the magic happens. Also average weather conditions in LA, California, USA. You're welcome.<br />
<br />
Smells heavenly and buttery powdery when worn right. Like a love affair in between an obscure artist gal and a Patagonia-wearing finance guy. You'll know.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2229957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2229957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2228231" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="charlotte__"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1354164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="charlotte__" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2228231ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2228231" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354164">charlotte__</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-24">07/24/24 13:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very clean, almost mildly soapy sandalwood. It reminds me of expensive shaving cream, like the kind that comes in a bowl with a metal razor. Ultimately a little overplayed nowadays but I understand why. It’s a classic. Unisex and good for day to night. Unfortunately I feel like it will become the new Dior Sauvage (reputation-wise).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2228231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2228231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227221" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2227221" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SimplDude"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SimplDude" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-1826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood"title="Oud Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2227221ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2227221" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369442">SimplDude</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-23">07/23/24 12:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I scooped a bottle of this frag from eBay at a really great price 👍 I should have bought two. It’s a blind buy and a lucky one because I love this fragrance. True enough, it’s a type of fragrance that you’ll love it or hate it but I ended up loving it. At first spray it’s kind of weird, but after a while the smell gets better and better especially in the air. It has a nice classy  leather vibe on the dry down no wonder why this is popular in New York. <br />
<br />
This kind of fragrance plays with your mood and it smells great when you’re in the mood to wear it with matching get up and is great for spring and summer or even early fall. <br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2227221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2227221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2226546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's one of those scents that you either love or hate not a safe blind buy so recommend trying before buying. Very expensive but still a quality fragarance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2225477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2225477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224203" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lanascola"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1594003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lanascola" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224203ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224203" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); She wears her leather jackets and drinks her martinis religiously. It smells like VERY expensive bath products too. Just a perfume that oozes with style, since I've never smelt anything like this before. Just a shame i'd have to sell my right kidney to buy the full size :/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2224203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2224203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222798" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChanelleMulan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152347"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2152347.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChanelleMulan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152347">ChanelleMulan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 17:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Why is anyone getting pickles? Do people mean DILL? Because I could understand a dill note even though I can't really smell dill. But pickles as in a vinegar/cucumber/dill' the type that you eat out of the jar? Maybe some people are wearing it while sweaty so that's where the pickle note is coming from. Nothing about this fragrance is pickly.. Actually it starts smelling a lot like leather on me after a couple of hours. I remember back in the days going through my mother's closet, she had these nice expensive leather bags and jackets and this is exactly what Santal 33 smells like. Like an expensive leather jacket/bag in your mom's closet with her nice sandalwood perfume stuck on it. I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2222798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2222798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217294" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miniboos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/119066"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="miniboos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/119066">miniboos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 04:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is extremely polarising- people either seem to love it or hate it. Personally, I cant stand it.<br />
I've heard so many rave reviews about this that I had to try and for the life of me, I just don't get it.<br />
It's just so sharp, jarring, and smells just like pickle juice and I can smell it a mile off whenever anyone wears it. I dont think its just my chemistry either as it smells exactly like pickle juice to me on other people too- so perhaps its an olfactory thing.  Not for me, I stay as far away from this as possible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2217294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2217294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It’s inappropriate sexy, intoxicating scent. perfectly unisex . A bit funky, you don’t know you absolutely love it or hate it :))) you will be definitely noticed in the crowd! From far far away. And if you leave the room your scent will stay there for a long time to just make sure that it kills the survivors :)) you must be careful with this one! It’s so interesting and at the time was very unique, now it’s duped a lot. But I’m a big fan of this scent .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2216763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2216763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2216330" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rowrow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2192348.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="rowrow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2216330ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2216330" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2192348">rowrow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 07:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this is exactly what it advertises itself to be.  If you want a woody-floral with good projection and longevity that is a little off the beaten path, try this.  I think many of the Le Labo's have a little funkiness to them but I like that.  I also disagree with hating on a fragrance only because it is popular.  If you like it you should wear it regardless if no one else or everyone else does.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2216330"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2216330#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215469" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215469" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="No.1Critique"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2191688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="No.1Critique" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215469ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215469" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191688">No.1Critique</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 12:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I honestly cant think any reason why people would find this sexy or even just a pleasant fragrance. If someone would wear this next to me i would sit as far as possible because i wouldnt bear this smell for too long. The only good thing about this is that the performance is pretty solid with good projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2215469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2215469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215057" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215057" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Skellyt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1761303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Skellyt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Angelique-Noire-1021.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1021.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angélique Noire"title="Angélique Noire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215057ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215057" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761303">Skellyt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 04:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It feels inappropriate for me to give this fragrance a bad review given its popularity and impact. So in this case I’m gonna give it a “meh”. Bad scent for me to wear, but I love its niche quality in the air.<br />
<br />
My girlfriend, multiple years ago, was babysitting for a family friend and discovered a Santal 26 candle in their bathroom. She fell in love with the scent and vowed to get a candle one day when she had her own funds.<br />
<br />
We purchased the candle together and I will say that in the air it is a luxurious scent. Yes, I get that dill smell by the way, but I’ve grown rather fond of it. Just not on my skin :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2215057"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2215057#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214095" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GR46"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540476"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="GR46" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2214095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2214095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2212506" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2212506" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chyan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007973"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1007973.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chyan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Materi/Neroli-Hasbaya-97875.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97875.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Néroli Hasbaya"title="Néroli Hasbaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2212506ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2212506" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007973">chyan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-08">07/08/24 21:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a love hate relationship with this fragrance; sometimes it’s all I wear for days and other times I’ll spray it and will have to immediately put something on over it.   Crazy thing is, it makes everything else smell better, even when I can’t stand the smell of it alone.  It’s better in the heat, stays on even after a swim, and i know when time for me to stop wearing it so much because it will start to smell too woody or pickly— but it’s not pickles, more of an astringent freshness or sharpness that others allude to that balances the leather and sandalwood and makes it so unique. This scent and Lavande have been in the heaviest rotation for me this summer. This is surprising because and Santal33 was the biggest turnoff for me for years until a friend gave me a bottle and I started spraying it liberally and layering with other scents. Don’t know what it is about this but I think this is one I may always need around.<br />
<br />
I am really surprised to see violet, cardamom and iris I cannot pick them out at all</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2212506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2212506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211586" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="crystalbrosas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1469763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1469763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="crystalbrosas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211586ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211586" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); It's very woody so the sandalwood note is very prominent. Unfortunately, it smells like grandma's old cabinet on my skin. Very mature and vintage-y for my taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2211586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2211586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210969" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2210969" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thesmithslover2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2123665"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2123665.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thesmithslover2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal 33"title="Santal 33"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2210969ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2210969" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2123665">thesmithslover2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 09:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Santal 33 my beloved. The love of my life. Et cetera.<br />
<br />
 You only smell pickle in this if you are trying to smell pickle. There's kind of a vague whisper of a cucumber-y smell and that's the closest to pickles there is. As the name suggests, it's sandalwood. Intoxicating sandalwood with whispers of leather, cardamom, iris, violet, etc. There are quite a few people who just dislike things because they are popular and I think this has become a victim of that mentality because it's associated with hipster-y 2010s New York types.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2210969"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2210969#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2210871" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stidal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2117272"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2117272.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stidal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boka/Zelen-87722.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87722.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zelen"title="Zelen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2210871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2210871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2117272">stidal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 07:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Incredibly inoffensive, mass-appealing woody fragrance. The sandalwood is the main player here, so much so that I was surprised to find out that this had leather in it the first time I read the notes. I definitely get a little bit of the "pickle" note that people mention, but it's very subtle and only apparent if you're really looking for it. All in all, I think this works on virtually anyone and is hard to dislike. Performs pretty well, lasts longer than the other Le Labo scents and probably has slightly better projection, too. That being said, we all know how ubiquitous this scent has become so if your goal is to smell unique maybe look elsewhere. I genuinely smell this about 3 times a day when I'm on campus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2210871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2210871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2208209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2208209" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vintila R."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1570569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vintila R." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2208209ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2208209" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570569">Vintila R.</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-04">07/04/24 12:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Le Labo store is 15 minutes from my current place, the street where it is located smells like Santal 33. There's no way to walk through my neighbourhood without passing by someone that smells like this. The first time I smelled it (before I moved near the store) I felt repulsion, there was no way I could find that wet wood scent pleasing. I was surprised because I love sandalwood. Then I moved and I started getting used to it, I find it "interesting" now; however, it is so hyped and recognizable that I believe that part of the magic of rediscovering it has faded away. It's also common (in my city) to enter places that smell like Santal 33. A large number of stores have it as their main air freshener scent. It is so suitable for spaces that I can't see it as perfume anymore.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2208209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2208209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205483" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zervshops"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1834809"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="zervshops" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205483ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205483" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1834809">zervshops</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-02">07/02/24 01:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is so good. So refreshing. I can't get enough of the smell. Very good stuff that I can see myself wearing often. I love woodsy natural smells.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2205483"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2205483#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Those mid-century homes in Hollywood Hills. My Chateau Marmot, room with a view, penthouse, and soaring cypress. It's like peering over a koi pond lined with cedar planks and water lilies all around. It's jazzy and suave. My jet-setter, hip-girl, youth filled scent. Enjoyable for men and woman alike. Loved by New Yorkers and Californians alike. Perfect for a brunette like me. Walking down the street, you see the coolest, most beautiful person ever. That person is probably sporting Santal 33.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2197717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2197717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463">Aquapinkmoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 02:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mmmm this is GOOD GOOD. My aunty wore it to the shops and I kept getting amazing whiffs all day, i complimented her multiple times and then purchased it instantly. This scent is so hard to explain but so perfect, like pine trees and the crisp, fresh air you smell when you’re near the woods. But it’s also slightly creamy in the dry down, SLIGHTLY sweet from the cardamom and sandalwood. I can detect leather but in a good way? I usually really dislike leather notes but this fragrance is blended so beautifully, it’s fresh and woody and leathery but in the best way possible. It’s comforting and sweet as-well, I wouldn’t recommend blind buying but, Santal 33 is definitely worth trying! If you love it you’ll LOVE it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2196886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2196886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196084" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lasts me over 8 hours with insane projection with just 3 sprays!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2195533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2195533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194808" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Om3r_perfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140989"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2140989.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Om3r_perfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21548.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oajan"title="Oajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2140989">Om3r_perfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 00:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Le Labo’s Santal 33 is a cardamon, woody and amber scent. As it dries down it changes to a more woody scent. In my opinion it opens up fresh with the cardamon mimicking a summer fragrance while it dries down to a woody scent suited better for the winter. So it’s hard to explain which season it’s best to wear this fragrance, I guess you could say it’s a good all rounder scent. <br />
<br />
Santal 33 lasts about 6 hours and doesn’t project much honestly. I would wear this in more casual settings and outtings. I would prefer to wear this during the day time due to that cardamon note and fresh opening. <br />
<br />
In my opinion this scent is overpriced for what you are getting. I’m not really liking its scent too much, paired with the poor performance I do think that you are overpaying. Honestly, there are better designer fragrances out there. I do think that this scent is a bit dissapointing and lackluster.<br />
<br />
Scent: 6<br />
Projection: 3<br />
Longevity: 5<br />
Value: 3<br />
Overall: 3</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2194808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2194808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193121" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193121" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bugsyiii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/961762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.961762.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bugsyiii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal 33"title="Santal 33"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193121ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193121" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/961762">bugsyiii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 10:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What an exceptional fragrance! I get major woods and slight sweetness, more of a crisp ting, with a bit of spice in the middle. I am in love with the deep leathery goodness that envelopes throughout the fragrance's journey. Such a great blend and mixture, equally glad to now have this in the collection. (P.S. I don't get the pickle or dill others refer too).<br />
<br />
Le Labo Santal 33 has:<br />
~Great performance; (8)<br />
~Great longevity; (7)<br />
~Great sillage; (7)<br />
~Great strength; (8)<br />
~Great Scent trail; (8.5)<br />
~Overall; (7.5)<br />
<br />
An overall, very effective and prominent fragrance! Definitely a signature scent in my book.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2193121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2193121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2191634" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bignose.reviews"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169555"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bignose.reviews" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2191634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2191634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169555">Bignose.reviews</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 02:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my SOTD everyday! A fantastic fragrance that gets compliments and can be worn all year round. The notes i get are a soft spearmint with whispering woody and moss notes, its the perfect combination in my opinion. For the evening i layer this with a fragrance oil with notes of nutmeg, saffron and tonka bean. FYI from experience of owning this for 5 years,  2-4 people have said they can smell pickles.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2191634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2191634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
