I don't get the hype.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2187285"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2187285#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2186856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2186856" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanyako"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157267"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2157267.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanyako" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2186856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2186856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157267">tanyako</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pickles, warm cozy and slightly sweet up close. Refreshing, clean, modern. Green woody. Moss.  Casual every day. Quirky. Outdoorsy. Very unisex. Hotel lobby fragrance. Quiet luxury, hipster lumberjacks. Cucumber face mask. Woody cabin. It’s so so cozy. Zero headache. Soothing. Makes me want to keep smelling myself. Good projection too. I want to cuddle with myself. A bit too much pickle scent. Very woody drydown.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2186856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2186856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184567" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bnknowsfrag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132381"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2132381.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bnknowsfrag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132381">Bnknowsfrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-10">06/10/24 23:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I remember smelling this when I was just starting collecting and I had never heard of the brand or the fragrance before but this was really good and I remember the smell distinctly in my head. So this fragrance is really woody in the dry down and, I don’t know if anyone else thinks this, but it kind of smelt like a woody watermelon and it was really unique smelling. I think le labo is one of those brands where they don’t have any “beast mode” fragrances but they are all very inoffensive and safe and you will always get compliments especially with santal 33. The performance is actually pretty good lasting a good 8-10 hours and projects well. Overall a great fragrance made by a great brand.<br />
<br />
Smell 9/10<br />
Sillage 7.8/10<br />
Longevity 8.2/10<br />
Bottle 8.2/10<br />
How much would I pay for it. 50ml: £120</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2184567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2184567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182605" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182605" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vminie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2128906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vminie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182605ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182605" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2128906">vminie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 22:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I remember feeling surprised when I first tried this. I don't know why I thought it would smell like straight sandalwood right away. But it started out like a faint leather musky kind of smell with hints of wood. It quickly transforms into this sandalwood scent that's a bit spicy or musky. I would actually prefer if it is more powdery or creamier during that phase of its scent. It is STILL powdery but for some reason the leathery musk is giving me headaches. I still like it though. It's not THAT bad. But I won't cry if I don't have a bottle of this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2182605"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2182605#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2181224" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrRealist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1709277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrRealist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2181224ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2181224" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1709277">MrRealist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-07">06/07/24 12:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Crazy how a scent can make you think of the past. Not sure why this reminds me of my childhood, maybe pencil shavings? Or I was around a lot of wood as a child! Ha. To me this is a creamy wood fragrance and I love it, I get no smell of this dill pickle malarkey that some reviewers mention. Seems to project and last well. I’ve just bought a bottle and I don’t care if others like this as this one is for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2181224"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2181224#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181145" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177799" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="carrico1986"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153909"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1153909.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="carrico1986" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153909">carrico1986</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 10:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got the oakcha version of this, so I don't know how accurate it actually is to Le labo 33, but reading the description for this scent, the feeling it is supposed to invoke is a kind of old-school western cowboy-type scent. It honestly does feel that way a bit to me. On me I get iris, violet and leather. It is sweet, but not sickeningly sweet and not a girly-girl sweet either if that makes sense? I enjoy this scent a lot. Reading the reviews I was worried I had just ordered pickle juice, but I was pleasantly surprised!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2177799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2177799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177434" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Santal 33 will forever be in my fragrance collection. The fragrance is unique, has amazing projection and sillage, and is ideal for anyone and any situation/occasion/season. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2169550" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="erayikari"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2069762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2069762.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="erayikari" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Rehab-50351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rehab"title="Rehab"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2169550ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2169550" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2069762">erayikari</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-27">05/27/24 14:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is good i dont think this is mass appealing but its real good smells exactly like sandalwood . its hard to wear i cant pull this up with my casual clothes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2169550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2169550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2169200" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Messidor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650471"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Messidor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2169200ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2169200" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650471">Messidor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-27">05/27/24 08:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Good projection and longevity.<br />
On blotter, it's not heavy on creamy calm sandal (not surprising at all). Indeed it's woody, but in a wet and weird way with leather and violet leaf, which reminds me of the fresh trunk of a tree (whose name I can't recall) that's at the verge of rotting with rain and fungi, or eastern asian forest floor with rotten foliage after showers. Interesting to my nose though, not quite wearable.<br />
On skin, creamy sandal is mroe prominent,yet leather and violet leaf are still trying to cover it up. It's close to the scent of fresh sandal trunk.<br />
I think its fame is based more on the brand's name than on the scent per se. Nevertheless its' popular. Considering its price, to a scent lover, I'd say 'save your money', but to a trend follower, I'd say 'just grab a full bottle'.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2169200"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2169200#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168839" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168839" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jbozz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1445544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jbozz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Le-Parfum-94983.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94983.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Le Parfum"title="MYSLF Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168839ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168839" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445544">jbozz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 20:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finally added this iconic scent to my collection and I am simply in love with it (even bought the matching body lotion). I get absolutely no pickle smell whatsoever thankfully. To my nose and on my skin I get the leather more than anything, like a beautiful saddle leather which I just can’t get enough of, and I also smell wood chips. This is a very comforting scent and I can totally understand its popularity. There’s not much I can add to what’s already been said but I must share my biggest pet peeve with this brand - what the f#€k is with the crappy atomizer? C’mon Le Labo, you’re already charging a premium, at least upgrade your atomizer. It kinda just shoots out the juice, plus mine was leaking upon receiving it but after a few sprays seems okay now. Anyway if Dior can do it so can you. That said this fragrance will be a staple in my wardrobe for as long as it’s available. Beautiful scent from start to finish and in my opinion lives up to the hype.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2168839"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2168839#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765038">jascask</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 04:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i didn'f fall in love with this fragrance when i first sprayed it on...i let moments pass and ohhh it blew me away how tempting and delectable iit is,i was wearing this perfume 1 time at the mall and 3 women were following me,i smiled at them and 1 approached to ask what scent i am wearing....i guess the sillage and projection were that much for them to notice...it's clearly a refreshing scent to wear esp/when you live in the middle east ...it isn't too strong nor subtle...for me its pefect!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2168181"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2168181#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pooche"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1887496"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pooche" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1887496">Pooche</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 23:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this fragrance and I find myself going back to my sample often. It does have a “cucumber water” impression that is often alluded to (some say pickle juice/vinegar-y) ,but I think people exaggerate its prominence. What I find missing from discussions about santal 33 is that it is quite leathery, in my opinion, which few mention is reviews. I think this is a scent really does need to be tried on skin. When I first sprayed it on a blotter I was not convinced to get a sample at all, I’m glad I ended up getting one though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2168042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2168042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167721" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Edinburgh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Edinburgh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-Eau-de-Parfum-40069.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40069.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum"title="Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407923">Edinburgh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 14:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From the Le Labo website describing Santal 33:<br />
<br />
“Imagine sitting in solitude on the rugged, wide plains of the American West, firelight on your face, indigo-blue night skies above. There is nothing around save for the soft, desert wind. You. Are. Free.” <br />
<br />
… Yes! Free. NOT. To. Spend…<br />
<br />
hundreds of Euros/Dollars on Le Labo unappealing watered-down concoctions, which disappear as soon as you spray them. <br />
<br />
How long are these “niche” houses going to get away with their status schemes? Only as long as you let them.<br />
<br />
“Niche” my foot—Le Labo is owned by Estée Lauder— and Lauder is Wall Street. So stop being fooled into thinking that you are buying “niche”— because many of these houses are owned by monster conglomerates.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2167721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2167721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167511" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167511" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Albena96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414436"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414436.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Albena96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-White-Imperiale-78474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit White Imperiale"title="Club de Nuit White Imperiale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167511ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167511" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414436">Albena96</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 09:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like a dill salad to me ..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2167511"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2167511#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165572" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165572" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luna k"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1433871"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1433871.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="luna k" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovan/White-Musk-7524.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7524.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Musk"title="White Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165572ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165572" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1433871">luna k</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not so sure about this one.  With apologies to Ren and Stimpy this perfume seemed to cause a song to get stuck in my head which made me laugh.  It's the music from the Slinky jingle:<br />
<br />
What rolls downstairs, alone or in pairs<br />
.....<br />
It's log, it's log<br />
It's big, it's heavy, it's wood.<br />
It's log, it's log, it's better than bad, it's good.<br />
<br />
Everyone wants a log<br />
You're gonna love it, log<br />
Come on and get your log<br />
Everyone needs a log<br />
log log log<br />
<br />
LOG FROM BLAMMO<br />
<br />
So far that is what I think of it.  A highly synthetic smell like some mid century Madmen ad agency types invented fake wood smells and convinced half the public that it's good.  I'll have to try it again some time but so far for myself, it's worse than good it's bad.  Not everyone needs a log. Dah dah dah dah dah.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2165572"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2165572#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164760" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I mean New Yorkers hate everything but they love Santal 33. Great fragrance that garners A Lot of positive attention.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2164760"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2164760#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164055" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="afonsodm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1923081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="afonsodm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164055ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164055" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2164055"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2164055#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2163908" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ajlis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2074474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ajlis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2163908ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2163908" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074474">Ajlis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 02:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Living in the periphery has its advantages. Le Labo is not sold in my (small, European) country, and hardly anyone here has heard of Santal 33, so I don't have to worry about its popularity. I have never smelled this fragrance on anyone but myself. Also, I don't know what kind of pickles you have over there in the US, but on my skin, nothing in this fragrance reminds me of pickles. Instead, I smell a soothing and meditative, dry sandalwood that stays close to the skin. The scent is fresh but deep, casual but luxury at the same time. Santal 33 makes me feel powerful and competent and I could imagine wearing this perfume in important meetings or other challenging situations. To me, this is a grounding perfume that helps me focus and calm down. This is my favourite sandalwood scent, even better than Diptyque’s Tam Dao.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2163908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2163908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159762" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2159762" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Henry001"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135994"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2135994.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Henry001" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2159762ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2159762" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135994">Henry001</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 02:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is truly wonderful. Its woody and powdery notes are simply enchanting. I don't understand the criticism it sometimes gets. It's definitely one of my favorites and I love wearing it all the time. It's suitable for everyone, regardless of gender. Overall, I'd rate it a solid nine out of ten</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2159762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2159762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159729" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2159729" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gashtasb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/247766"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.247766.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gashtasb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Original-Cologne-Pure-White-Cologne-13391.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13391.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Original Cologne (Pure White Cologne)"title="Original Cologne (Pure White Cologne)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2159729ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2159729" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2159729"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2159729#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159437" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2159437" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Juleigh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2017834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2017834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Juleigh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Alhambra/Kismet-Angel-79015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kismet Angel"title="Kismet Angel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2159437ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2159437" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2017834">Juleigh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-17">05/17/24 16:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My sister gifted me the 100 mil bottle of this. It does NOT last. A thousand dollars for the bottle and you  nor anybody near you, can smell it. I've found dupes for $30 that smell just like it and last longer. Total waste of her money. I'm sad about it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2159437"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2159437#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152921" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152921" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CyanM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2088532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2088532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CyanM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Vanilla-28-52616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla 28"title="Vanilla 28"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152921ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152921" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2088532">CyanM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lot of leather, a lot of powdery iris, and a bit of violet. On me this pulled very masculine, although as with any perfume, there are women who could rock it. It seems clear from the reviews that there are a huge variety of interpretations of the scent, possibly because it's not obviously the smell of anything specific; it's a savory, leathery, but not representative fragrance. I don't get any of the pickle or wet dog or cucumber, just leather and wood and powder. High-end leather has a warmth to it, sort of a subtle tastiness, that is missing here—it's a bit synthetic. Overall, this is not for me, but I recognize the interest value, and it clearly has different notes on different people.<br />
<br />
Over time: Initially this smells like leather, not super strong, with a faint hint of something powdery and savory. It smells like a leather booth at a high end diner. After ten minutes the iris and violet are a bit more noticeable. After forty-five minutes, although it's not super strong, it's oddly pervasive. My world smells like a leather goods store. After an hour and a half, the wood and powder are noticeable, but it mostly smells like leather. After that it's linear all the way down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2152921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2152921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152859" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="babydolldress"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2101583.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="babydolldress" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152859ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152859" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2152859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2152859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152584" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cinnamongrl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2086762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2086762.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cinnamongrl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2086762">cinnamongrl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 06:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the most comforting perfume ever. reminds me of being a child and finally hugging my dad after he returned home from work. subtle, perfect. perhaps too common though... every time i smell it on the street i find myself turning, wondering which of the retreating figures is my father</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2152584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2152584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152408" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="h149"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1210940.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="h149" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152408ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152408" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210940">h149</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 02:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is Santal 33? Really? It smells like cheap faux leather on me…no more and no less<br />
<br />
Edit: it performs better and is more multidimensional on fabric. I can pick up the leather and violet, which is always a winning combination, and they’re nicely balanced to enhance one another. But it mystifies me that it can’t do this on my skin…isn’t that the point of wearing a fragrance? And would this explain why I’ve had a bad experience with all the Le Labo scents I’ve tried so far, that they only perform on clothes?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2152408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2152408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2149857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2149857" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lujbass"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099334"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2099334.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lujbass" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Caron/Pois-de-Senteur-2021-68142.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68142.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pois de Senteur (2021)"title="Pois de Senteur (2021)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2149857ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2149857" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099334">Lujbass</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have tried Santal several times before falling in love with it. Whenever I smell it, I'm drawn to it, but not in a way that makes me want to wear it. Instead, it evokes my desire to be in a space filled with its scent. This was how I felt about Santal until I noticed its resemblance to the shampoo I use from the Kerastase Chroma Absolu line, which I absolutely adore. I was actually searching for a perfume that captures the essence of the Chroma Absolu line by Kerastase, and I'm thrilled that I found Santal.<br />
<br />
By the way, I noticed the similarity when I applied the melted oil/wax mix from the Santal candle to my hand, not the perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2149857"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2149857#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2149171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think my nose is blind to some synthetic ingredients. After a while though I started to smell a kind of powdery woodsy smell and it stuck around for some hours afterwards. My experience was not the best to say the least.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2149171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2149171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148575" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lindenberg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1319565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lindenberg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Fleur-d-Oranger-27-6331.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6331.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur d'Oranger 27"title="Fleur d'Oranger 27"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148575ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148575" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319565">lindenberg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A wonderful woody base. I tested this while looking for a new sandalwood-based perfume and this was definitely a good start. I mix it with Lys 41 when I want a scent that is close to my favorite discontinued perfume, Dior J'adore Touche de Parfum.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2148575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2148575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147456" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Plusdeplacenyc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101464"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2101464.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Plusdeplacenyc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Rocher/Cuir-de-Nuit-56459.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56459.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cuir de Nuit"title="Cuir de Nuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101464">Plusdeplacenyc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a polarizing scent for sure. I understand when people say " pencil shavings and pickles". On my brother this smells exactly like pickle juice but on me it smells like warm cardamom. Not a blind buy. It either gives warmth and tranquility or makes a person gag. Lucky for me, I'm the former.😉</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2147456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2147456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145491" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lovaloo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1209968.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lovaloo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mitsouko-Eau-de-Parfum-25316.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25316.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mitsouko Eau de Parfum"title="Mitsouko Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145491ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145491" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209968">Lovaloo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 09:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was given a free sample from the Nordstrom SA with an unrelated purchase.<br />
<br />
Watery, green top note. Herbal, woody, spicy, soapy, with a leathery, powdery texture. There's a dry, papery, papyrus note. The iso e super "pencil shavings" note is in here too. I see where the pickle juice comments are coming from, I think it's the deeply green cypriol oil combined with the violet &amp; cucumber top notes.<br />
<br />
To me, it smells like an old cedarwood chest that's been sitting inside a greenhouse. It would make a great linen/candle scent. I see why it's popular with people who live in large cities, it's a woody, green profile with a lot of subtle nuances. The exact thing city dwellers might crave.<br />
<br />
It smells okay, but it's a strong, synthetic scent, and it's not very like the smell of mysore sandalwood. Too dry, earthy, and leathery. Mysore is milky, creamy, grassy, hay-like, smoky... You can find a ton of mysore sandalwood reconstructions that smell closer to the real thing than this does, and at a lower price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2145491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2145491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2144710" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="theouddr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620488"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1620488.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="theouddr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2144710ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2144710" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620488">theouddr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 13:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get Santal 33 now... finally! I sampled this fragrance in 2020 when I first got into niche perfumery, and I was not crazy about it. As my nose has gotten more refined throughout the years, I can now appreciate the nuances of this, dare I say, masterpiece. There are fragrances that come close but can't match the overall experience that Santal 33 brings.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2144710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2144710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143283" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2143283" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="akronik96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1629860"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1629860.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="akronik96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2143283ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2143283" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); Was looking for that going in, and I was not disappointed. <br />
<br />
The sandalwood is very nice and creamy, and the overall scent is pleasant and wearable, even with the daring pickle accord.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12201"comment_id="2143219"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Le-Labo/Santal-33-12201.html?ccid=2143219#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142596" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138111" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alexhk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2096099"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="alexhk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138111ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138111" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);
